snippet.title: SantaCraft Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Dig your way through snow, cut down gingerbread trees, and mine candy canes as you try to rescue your missing reindeer, rebuild Santa's Village, and save Christmas!
Get SantaCraft on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1486840/SantaCraft/
And itch.io: https://milkbaggames.itch.io/santacraft
